N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.5 - Facility requirements

State Regulations

Any facility which provides preventive alcoholism counseling
services to a child shall at least: (a) develop an initial assessment and
evaluation to determine the extent of the preventive alcoholism counseling
services needed; (b) prepare a
written service plan for the provision of preventive alcoholism counseling
services based on individual assessments and evaluations; (c) provide preventive alcoholism counseling
services in accordance with the plan; (d) maintain a written record of the services
provided which shall include periodic notes relating to the child's progress; and
(e) write a closing summary of
the preventive alcoholism counseling services provided when it has been
determined that such services are no longer needed or when the child is no
longer receiving such services. Notes
